trans-unit.source: Defines the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个数据项与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控件中该数据项绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), if no menu item bindings are defined, a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到其中的每个数据项包含多个字段的数据源 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），如果未不定义任何菜单项绑定，菜单项显示返回的值`ToString()`方法默认情况下的数据项。

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XML 元素，该菜单项显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的菜单上，否则不是非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind the properties of a menu item to a specific field by specifying menu item bindings.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定菜单项绑定，可以将菜单项的属性绑定到特定的字段。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object defines the relationship between each data item and the menu item it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象定义的每个数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control, menu item bindings have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控件，菜单项绑定不起任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Binding is performed automatically using the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用站点地图提供商提供自动执行绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control stores its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the menu hierarchy and the data source hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制存储其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>属性并将绑定应用于要创建菜单层次结构和数据源层次结构之间的一对一关系的数据源。

trans-unit.source: For each data item in the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control attempts to match the data item to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to create the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 为数据源中的每个数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件尝试匹配数据项目写入到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象来创建相应的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>，和/或文件名。

trans-unit.source: A menu item depth specifies the menu level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项深度指定获取绑定的菜单级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>声明将绑定到数据源的名称和 ID 字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性，分别的所有节点的深度为 0:

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象) 公开<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A>属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员时数据源包含多个数据项目类型，指定的数据项目类型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>声明绑定`<Book>`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>的菜单中，而不考虑位置层次结构中的所有菜单项的控件：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: 有时你可能需要创建一个指定的深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。

trans-unit.source: This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value.
trans-unit.target: 仅当数据源包含在具有相同的数据成员值的不同级别的项目时，经常使用这种。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have `<Item>` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以`<Item>`出现在 XML 文件中的不同级别的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>的声明显示了如何指定应用于相同的数据成员位于不同的菜单深度的菜单项绑定：

trans-unit.source: If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项绑定定义的深度和数据成员中，菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth.
trans-unit.target: 这常用当所有数据项目具有相同的属性，并且应相同，显示无论菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 建立绑定条件后，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>可以绑定到一个值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Properties bound to fields contain the values of the corresponding field from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到字段的属性包含相应数据源的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override a bound property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object by setting the corresponding property directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地重写中的绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>通过直接设置对应的属性的对象。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>允许您绑定的属性的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>数据项的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: If conflicting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 如果冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义对象，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件适用以下优先顺序中的菜单项绑定：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象定义并匹配仅的深度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: (This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.)
trans-unit.target: （此类型的菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>数据源中没有匹配项的对象。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties of the menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性对其的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> class also allows you to format the text displayed in a menu item by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>类还允许您通过设置显示在菜单项的文本格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项绑定定义的深度或数据成员中，菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth.
trans-unit.target: 这常用当所有数据项目具有相同的属性，并且应相同，显示无论菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 建立绑定条件后，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>可以绑定到一个值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Properties bound to fields contain the values of the field from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到字段的属性包含的数据源的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: If conflicting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: 如果冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义对象，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件适用以下优先顺序中的菜单项绑定：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象定义并匹配仅的深度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义既不深度，也不数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: (This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.)
trans-unit.target: （此类型的菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>数据源中没有匹配项的对象。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties of the menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性对其的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named MenuDataMember.xml.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the menu depth to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: The menu depth to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property to specify the menu depth at which to apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性来指定要应用的菜单深度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all menu items with a depth of 0:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>声明将绑定到数据源的名称和 ID 字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性，分别的深度为 0 的所有菜单项：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: 有时你可能需要创建一个指定的深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。

trans-unit.source: This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value.
trans-unit.target: 仅当数据源包含在具有相同的数据成员值的不同级别的项目时，经常使用这种。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have `<Item>` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以`<Item>`出现在 XML 文件中的不同级别的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>的声明显示了如何指定应用于相同的数据成员位于不同的菜单深度的菜单项绑定：

trans-unit.source: If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项绑定定义的深度和数据成员中，菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth.
trans-unit.target: 这常用当所有数据项目具有相同的属性，并且应相同，显示无论菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 建立绑定条件后，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>可以绑定到一个值的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Properties bound to fields contain the values of the field from the data source.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象定义并匹配仅的深度。

trans-unit.target: （此类型的菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>数据源中没有匹配项的对象。

trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性对其的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property to specify the menu depth at which to apply a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性来指定要应用的菜单深度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied is enabled, allowing the item to display a pop-out image and any child menu items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的菜单项，以允许此菜单项显示一个弹出图像和任何子菜单项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的菜单项，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A>属性来设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: This setting is shared with all menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会对其的所有菜单项与共享<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image that indicates child items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`，菜单项被禁用并且不指示子项目的弹出图像将显示。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`的菜单项就是使该菜单项的末尾该节点，其中任何进一步的级别会显示从该节点中移出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，该字段将绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled" /> 对象将应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到应用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.EnabledField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.EnabledField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can override the enabling of an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写各个菜单项启用通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.EnabledField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.EnabledField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.EnabledField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.EnabledField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字符串，用于指定应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的菜单项的文本显示格式。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串，用于指定应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的菜单项的文本显示格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A> property is used to provide a custom format for a menu item's text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A>属性用于为菜单项的文本提供自定义格式。

trans-unit.source: The format string can consist of a literal string, a placeholder, or both.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串可以包含文本字符串、 一个占位符，或两者。

trans-unit.source: The literal string is displayed verbatim, while the placeholder is replaced with the value that is bound to the menu item's text.
trans-unit.target: 占位符替换为用于绑定到的菜单项文本的值时，将按原义，显示的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder is split into two parts, separated by a colon, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}.
trans-unit.target: 占位符拆分为两个部分，在窗体中，以冒号分隔 {`A`:`Bxx`}。

trans-unit.source: For example, {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，{0: f2} 显示一个带两位小数定点数。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a placeholder and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: 占位符字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个占位符，而不是文本字符串中。

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。

trans-unit.source: Keeping to the standard formatting string syntax, the value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 标准格式字符串语法，冒号前的值将保持 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。

trans-unit.source: Because only one value can be displayed in each menu item, the parameter index can be set only to 0.
trans-unit.target: 因为可以在每个菜单项中显示只有一个值，则参数索引可以设置只为 0。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value.
trans-unit.target: 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定值的显示格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了常见的格式。

trans-unit.source: Format character
trans-unit.target: 格式字符

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in currency format.
trans-unit.target: 以货币格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in decimal format.
trans-unit.target: 以十进制格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 采用固定格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in general format.
trans-unit.target: 以常规格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in number format.
trans-unit.target: 采用数字格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 以十六进制格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A> property to format the text displayed in the menu items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 显示在应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的菜单项文本旁边的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL of a custom image to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A>属性来指定要绑定到自定义图像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: This image is shared with all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 与所有共享此映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: 图像将显示菜单项的文本的旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。

trans-unit.source: You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的图像其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to display the same image in each menu item, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data source.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性来显示每个菜单项中的同一个映像，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>到数据源的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to an image to display next to the text of the menu items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A>属性来指定要显示的菜单项的文本旁边的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This image is displayed in each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此映像显示在每个菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Menu.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，该字段将绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl" /> 对象将应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到应用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: 图像将显示菜单项的文本的旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。

trans-unit.source: You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的图像其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display the same image in each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以向其每个菜单项中显示相同映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>的菜单项的属性。

trans-unit.source: This URL is shared with all menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 与对其的所有菜单项共享此 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the menu item, the user is taken to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击菜单项时，则用户将转到指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can override the URL for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property directly.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to navigate to the same URL in each menu item, you can also bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性来导航到每个菜单项中的同一个 URL，还可以绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>通过设置数据源的字段的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.target: 与对其的所有菜单项共享此 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置各个菜单项的 URL 重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.PopOutImageUrl%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.PopOutImageUrl%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.PopOutImageUrlField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.PopOutImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.PopOutImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.PopOutImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to navigate to the same URL from each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied is selectable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: 此设置会对其的所有菜单项与共享<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is not "clickable" but any child items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`，菜单项不是"可单击"，但会显示任何其子项。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象是否正将更改保存到其视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件标记为保存其状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved view state values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含保存的视图状态值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the node's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: 加载节点的以前保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Saves the view state changes to an <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the view state changes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象跟踪对其视图状态的更改。

trans-unit.source: After this method has been called on a server control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件，调用此方法后<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，在此目标窗口或框架中显示与应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的菜单项关联的网页内容。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A>属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control for the menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>对其的菜单项控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override this property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each menu item directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以有选择地通过重写此属性设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>直接每个菜单项的属性。

trans-unit.source: Target values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 目标值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），但下表中所示，以下划线开头某些特殊值除外范围的开头。

trans-unit.source: Target value
trans-unit.target: 目标值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: 将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: 在搜索窗格中呈现内容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A> property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A>属性呈现为`target`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A> property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 未设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A>属性如果呈现的输出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象必须是符合 XHTML 1.1。

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。

trans-unit.source: When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A> property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议你避免使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A>属性将作为目标另一个窗口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到应用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TargetField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时，链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。

trans-unit.source: When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A> property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议你避免使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A>属性将作为目标另一个窗口。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control for this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，设置此属性重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>此菜单项的控件。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to open a new window can make it difficult for users of assistive technology devices to use the page.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性以打开新窗口可以变得比较困难的辅助技术设备的用户使用的页面。

trans-unit.source: You can override enabling an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写启用各个菜单项，通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TargetField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TargetField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Target%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TargetField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TargetField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 对象的菜单项显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for the menu item to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 为应用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的菜单项显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A> property to specify the text to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed in a menu item and is shared with all menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此文本显示在菜单项并对其的所有菜单项与共享<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置各个菜单项的文本重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to display the same text in each menu item, you can also bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性来显示每个菜单项中的相同的文本，还可以绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>通过设置数据源的字段的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create empty nodes in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> properties to the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 无法创建在空节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties.
trans-unit.target: 将这些属性设置为空字符串作为未设置这些属性的效果相同。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control creates a default binding using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件创建默认绑定使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，该字段将绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text" /> 对象将应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到应用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的数据源的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed in the menu items.
trans-unit.target: 此文本显示在菜单项。

trans-unit.source: You can override the text for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置各个菜单项的文本重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create empty nodes in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> properties to the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 无法创建在空节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Setting these properties to the empty string has the same effect as not setting the properties.
trans-unit.target: 将这些属性设置为空字符串作为未设置这些属性的效果相同。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control creates a default binding using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件创建默认绑定使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display the same text in each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以向其每个菜单项中显示相同的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>的菜单项的属性。

trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: You can override the ToolTip for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ToolTip%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的工具提示其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ToolTip%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to specify the same ToolTip for each menu item, you can also bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ToolTipField%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ToolTip%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.

trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据源中字段的名称，该字段将绑定到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value" /> 对象将应用到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到应用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding" /> 的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not displayed in a menu item and is used to store any additional data about a menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不会显示在菜单项和用于存储有关的菜单项的任何其他数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象，如用于处理回发事件数据。

trans-unit.source: You can override the value for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置各个菜单项的值重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>直接属性。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，和 / 或。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to specify the same value for each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你指定的每个菜单项相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>的菜单项的属性。

trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Menu.xml 文件。
